backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and CRUD methods for blueprints, artifacts, twin drafts, playbooks, and scenarios with map‑based storage and file‑storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for UI and module implementations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries describing the purpose of each frontend React component, hook, and utility file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions specifying a neutral premium color palette with light/dark variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing active section state, theme provider, query client, and rendering AppShell with pages.
frontend/src/components/blueprint/Bluepr: Displays saved blueprints in cards with trait previews and delete actions.
Multi-step founder‑trait wizard that generates a doctrine manual and saves a new blueprint.
frontend/src/components/blueprint/Doctri: Displays the doctrine manual text and provides buttons to export it as .txt or .md.
Wraps the main application layout with header, left navigation, and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the top header with branding and a button to load demo data.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftNav.t: Provides a sidebar navigation menu for switching between major app sections.
frontend/src/components/narrative/Playbo: Form for generating, exporting, and saving narrative playbooks based on user inputs.
Displays saved playbooks with delete functionality and brief content previews.
frontend/src/components/shared/DemoBadge: Shows a small 'Demo' badge used to mark demo items.
frontend/src/components/shared/QueryStat: Handles loading, error, empty, and success UI states for data queries.
frontend/src/components/simulator/Scenar: UI for selecting and comparing two saved scenarios side‑by‑side.
Form to configure assumptions, run a simulation, and save a scenario with results.
Renders a grid of scenario cards with metadata, outcome summaries, assumption badges, and delete actions using scenario query hooks.
Displays scenario results including success probability, key drivers, and branch rationales in a set of cards.
frontend/src/components/twin/ArtifactIng: Provides UI for adding, viewing, and deleting artifacts with form handling and react-query mutations.
frontend/src/components/twin/TwinDraftWo: Offers a workspace to configure draft mode, generate deterministic responses using artifacts and blueprints, and save drafts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable react-query keys for all data entities including blueprints, artifacts, playbooks, scenarios, and drafts.
Implements react-query hooks to load, save, and delete artifacts via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBlueprints: Provides querying and mutation helpers for blueprints, supporting load, save, and delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDemoData.t: Exposes a mutation to seed demo data and invalidate all related queries on completion.
Manages fetching, saving, and deleting playbooks through actor-backed react-query mutations.
Handles scenario loading and CRUD operations with react-query and automatically refreshes cache on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTwinDrafts: Loads and persists twin drafts using react-query and actor methods with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity, and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/exportText.ts: Exports text or markdown content by creating a Blob and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/lib/generators/doctrineManu: Generates a formatted doctrine manual string using a blueprint name and trait descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/generators/playbook.ts: Builds a narrative playbook string with positioning, controversy strategy, media angles, and long‑term narrative guidance.
frontend/src/lib/generators/simulator.ts: Runs a deterministic simulation scoring assumptions to produce a probability, top drivers, and decision branches.
frontend/src/lib/generators/twinDraft.ts: Generates draft documents (board memo, investment eval, PR fallout) using prompt inputs, artifacts, and traits.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BlueprintPage.tsx: Renders the Cognitive Blueprint page with a wizard for creating blueprints and a list view wrapped in a query state component.
frontend/src/pages/NarrativePage.tsx: Displays the Narrative Dominance module with a playbook creation form and a list of existing playbooks using query state handling.
frontend/src/pages/SimulatorPage.tsx: Provides the Strategic Decision Simulator with scenario creation, comparison mode, and a scenario list controlled by query state.
frontend/src/pages/TwinPage.tsx: Implements the AI Founder Twin interface with tabs for artifact ingestion and a drafting workspace, plus a module description card.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and adds typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Stores overall project state, feature list, requirements, image needs, and metadata for the MythOS Elite prototype.
